text: :grapes: It’s frustrating that Pretalx doesn’t tell me how many of my N characters I have used and (more usefully) how many I have left

elements.text: It’s frustrating that Pretalx doesn’t tell me how many of my N characters I have used and (more usefully) how many I have left

text:
Open an issue on their GitHub? They are slowly, but surely fixing that kinda thing as it us brought up.
Mention you encountered this when submitting for JuliaCon (since we do pay them)

text: By them I mean the individual. It is one person doing this as a side gig I think

text:
If you are on linux (maybe also macOS), you could copy to the clipboard and then run this in your terminal
`xclip -o sel clip | wc -m | awk '{print 5000 - $1}'` (assuming xclip and awk are installed)

elements.text: If you are on linux (maybe also macOS), you could copy to the clipboard and then run this in your terminal
